# Release Notes Template

## Version {{version}}

### Summary

A brief overview of the changes in this release.

### Features

- Description of new features
- User-impact statements
- Migration notes (if any)

### Bug Fixes

- List of resolved issues
- Reference issue numbers (e.g., #42)

### Breaking Changes

- Clearly document API or behavior changes
- Migration instructions

### Testing and Validation

- Platforms covered
- Notable test cases
- Coverage improvements

### Release Artifacts

- Docker image tags
- Branches created
- Obsidian vault templates included

---

## Notes

Include highlights relevant for users and developers alike to understand the context of this release.
